articles.description: Early and repeated exposures to diagnostic imaging, such as X-rays and CT scans, may increase the risk of testicular cancer, suggests a new study from Penn Medicine researchers published online today in PLOS ONE.

articles.title: Long-Acting Injectable Is More Effective Than Daily Pill To Prevent HIV In Women : Goats and Soda - NPR
articles.description: A single injection of a drug called cabotegravir given every two months has been shown to be more effective than a daily oral dose of Truvada.
